main event: A bright white object was observed hovering at approximately 2000 ft in Maracaibo, Venezuela, on 17 May 1960, before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object was about 50-60 ft in diameter., The object was observed for around 5 minutes., Witnesses had the impression that the object was not an aircraft but a UFO., The object hovered close to the altitude of other aircraft in the area., The speed of the object upon acceleration was significant, disappearing within about 5 seconds.
witness description: An observer who reported the sighting to the North American Air Defense Command.
